A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Walked off the theater hugely disappointed: Luke Skywalker (WTF?) oscillates between cowardice and heroism in the space of minutes.\nRey's training was a joke\, Yoda appearance was lame at best. The main space battle? One ship trying to escape another\, for 2 hours. Sub-plots and main villains? A mess. 1 star for the cinematography and 1 star for Benicio Del Toro\, who made a great job with the few lines he got.
